text: Tathapi yadi tomara mukha phera'o, tabe ami tomaderake ta pauchiyechi ya amara kache tomadera prati prerita hayeche; ara amara palanakarta an'ya kona jatike tomadera sthalabhisikta karabena, ara tomara tamra kichu'i bigarate parabe na; niscaya'i amara para'oyaradegara'i pratiti bastura hephajatakari.
